prompts: Create a sleek feline Pokemon with shiny purple fur and striking yellow accents.
Imagine a nimble creature that blends into urban environments with a purple and yellow color scheme.
Generate a stealthy Pokemon with sharp features and a playful personality, perfect for sneaking around.
Show me a cat-like Pokemon that is agile and has distinct markings to confuse its prey.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a mix of dark and vibrant colors.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and cunning, with an eye-catching purple coat.
Make a character that represents agility and charm, with a focus on stealth and evasiveness.
